title: Solar a Jio moment for Mukesh Ambani? Reliance shares get highest target price
description: Nuvama has set the highest target price of Rs 1,801 for Reliance Industries (RIL), betting that solar module production could trigger a re-rating similar to the surge seen after Reliance Jio’s 2017 launch. RIL recently announced its first 1 GW HJT module faci…
content: Betting that the production of solar modules could trigger a re-rating similar to what occurred in 2017 after the launch of Reliance Jio, domestic brokerage firm Nuvama has issued the highest target … [+3229 chars]
